main event: A bright circular object was observed in the sky moving rapidly in Mineral Wells, Virginia, in November 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as brighter and larger than a star., The sighting lasted for about 5-7 minutes., Multiple residents observed the object and reported its unusual characteristics., The object exhibited no sound during the observation., The report mentioned a separate encounter involving a salesman meeting a 'spaceman' who communicated telepathically.
sighted object: bright circular object in the sky
witness description: Residents of the area who observed the object.
